Plot: An alien takes the form of a young widow's husband and asks her to drive him from Wisconsin to Arizona. The government tries to stop them.
Title: Starman
Actors: Jeff Bridges, Karen Allen, Charles Martin Smith, Richard Jaeckel
tomatoConsensus: What initially begins as sci-fi transforms into a surprisingly sweet, offbeat drama, courtesy of John Carpenter's careful direction.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 5 nominations.
